name: ForecastDiscussion
0:
”Alexa ask forecast discussion to tell me the forecast discussion for Seattle”
”Alexa ask forecast discussion for the short-term discussion for Missoula”
”Alexa ask forecast discussion for the synopsis in Portland”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: forecast discussion
des:
NWS Forecast Discussion will have Alexa read you the forecast discussion from weather.gov for any weather forecast office in the US. Ask for the "forecast discussion" for the full forecast discussion, or ask for subsections like "short term discussion", "long term discussion", "synopsis", or "update" to have Alexa read just those sections. Note that forecast discussions may not contain all subsections.

Disclaimer: this skill is not affiliated with NWS in any way. I am simply scraping their data from the web and making it available via Alexa.

Please report any issues here:
https://github.com/cbrown83/Alexa_NWS_Forecast_Discussion
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
